data.title: Marching to the Beat of a Different Drum
data.meta_description: The Night We Met, Khulud Badawi Was Escaping the Horrors of the War in East Jerusalem's Al-Hakawati Theater. But It Seems Escapism Is Not What It Used to Be. Sh
